title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Computer-Based Personalized Learning Design for Advanced Music Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic music theory (harmony, rhythm, reading sheet music) and instrumental performance experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners with varying levels of musical intelligence perform rhythm analysis with over 80% accuracy using AI (audio+image) mode.
Accurately interpret over 50 music theory terms via TI (text+image) and AIT (audio+image+text) modes.
Submit creative works reflecting personal musical backgrounds and conduct peer feedback through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
